name: Flickering in the dark
description:
Introduction

Reach the end of these long corridors with a ... camera? Use the camera flash to light your path in these dark hallways .  You are not alone...

Controls

Moving - WASD 

Use camera - Left Click

Look around with the mouse

Other mentions

Hopefully you enjoy the game! I tried making a spooky one since we are approaching Halloween.  Fullscreen doesn't make the game look good at all so don't fullscreen! Its a bit scuffed as I started halfway through the jam but have fun!

-Jonathan
